column1: (1) We can only meet Customers when they have a specific need  (Choose one option)
column2: (2) Customers have a good understanding of our kind of services (Choose one option)
column3: (3) Customers know what is the best solution for them (Choose one option)
column4: (4) Customer know what they want and what they do not want (Choose one option)
column5: (5) Customers have a good knowledge of the different services/products offer by other competitors (Choose one option)
column6: (6) Customers are normally hard to influence (Choose one option)
column7: (7) Customers are generally resistant to new ideas and possible alternatives (Choose one option)
column8: (8) Customers have the relevant expertise to appreciate the differences that may exist between different suppliers (Choose one option)
column9: (9) Customers are most of the time resistant to advice (Choose one option)
column10: (10) Customers view us more as a supplier than a speaking partner (Choose one option)
column11: (11) Attitude of the decision makers in relation to sales people. (Choose the 4 most important statements)
column12: (12) We normally work more than 3 years in a row with a customer (Choose one option)
column13: (13) Our company brand name is a strong asset in customer contacts (Choose one option)
column14: (14) Our competitiveness is recognised easily by customers (Choose one option)
column15: (15) We are known for the superior quality of our products and services (Choose one option)
column16: (16) Our price is easily accepted by customers (Choose one option)
column17: (17) Most of the time we do not fight against other competitors (Choose one option)
column18: (18) Customers very often take the initiative to meet with us (Choose one option)
column19: (19) We can easily access key decision makers at customers (Choose one option)
column20: (20) Customers help us in customer acquisition by playing an active reference role when asked for (Choose one option)
column21: (21) We are certainly the "top of the mind supplier" when customers have a need (Choose one option)
column22: (22) Attitude of the decision makers in relation to the company's offering. (Choose the 4 most important statements)
column23: (23) I do my utmost to fulfil customers' expressed requirements (Choose one option)
column24: (24) I have a very nice and friendly contact (Choose one option)
column25: (25) I am empathetic and a very good listener (Choose one option)
column26: (26) I am really good at consolidating the relations by being flexible and caring (Choose one option)
column27: (27) I am happy to spend time with customers when they demand it (Choose one option)
column28: (28) I have a strong analysis ability based on a good investigation technique (Choose one option)
column29: (29) I am good at demonstrating my high level of expertise (Choose one option)
column30: (30) I am good at defining, explaining and showing (Choose one option)
column31: (31) I am really skilled at selling the competitiveness of our products (Choose one option)
column32: (32) I am using proofs: facts, figures and references systematically (Choose one option)
column33: My sales practices can be described as follows.(Choose the 4 most relevant statements)
column34: (34) I am very goal oriented: for every customer meeting I have a very clear sales objective (Choose one option)
column35: (35) I am skilled at drawing attention and creating interest from almost nothing (Choose one option)
column36: (36) I am comfortable at handling conflicts: I have a very good pressure resistance (Choose one option)
column37: (37) I am only chasing good opportunities (Choose one option)
column38: (38) I am strong at closing: steering every customer meeting to a decision (Choose one option)
column39: (39) I am skilled at challenging the customer's problem (Choose one option)
column40: (40) I am really taking into account the overall objective of the customer (stakes, results etc.) (Choose one option)
column41: (41) I am creative in finding new alternatives/solutions to customers' issues (Choose one option)
column42: (42) I am talented in selling complete customized solutions (Choose one option)
column43: (43) I am good at presenting our proposal as a unique way to reach customers' objectives (Choose one option)
column44: (44) My sales practices can be described as follows ( Choose the 4 most relevant statements)
